title: Add back navigation button

requirements.text: Add a back button to relevant pages (Products, Cart, Checkout, Order Confirmation, My Orders, Profile, Payment Failure, Payment Success) that navigates the user to the previous page in history. The button should be visually consistent with the app's warm Indian-themed design, placed at the top-left of the page content area, and should not appear on the Home page.
acceptanceCriteria: A back button is visible at the top-left of the content area on Products, Cart, Checkout, Order Confirmation, My Orders, Profile, Payment Failure, and Payment Success pages.
Clicking the back button navigates the user to the previous page in browser history.
The back button is not shown on the Home page.
The button styling uses the existing saffron/marigold/deep-red color palette and is visually consistent with the rest of the app.

nonGoals: Adding a back button to the Admin or Delivery dashboard pages.
Changing any navigation header or footer layout.
